name: Hootini
subtitle: Runic Debuffer
statsDescription: Hootini has the highest base LUCK (15) of all companions, making it naturally inclined toward critical hit builds. Low SPECIAL (4) means mark bonuses start weak but scale significantly with investment. Balanced CON (12) provides decent stamina for multiple marks.

content.name: Runic Mark!
content.cost: Cost: 3 Stamina | Duration: 12 Seconds | Cooldown: 40 Seconds
content.description: A powerful debuff ability that marks enemies with ancient runes, amplifying all damage they take while granting Hootini a massive personal damage boost against marked targets.

content.text: Dual Damage Amplification
Runic Mark provides two independent damage bonuses that stack together for devastating results:

bonuses.title: Shared Debuff
bonuses.description: Marked enemies take 3-27% more damage from all sources (including you, the player, and other companions). This debuff benefits your entire team.
bonuses.formula:
Debuff = 3 + 24 √ó (1 - 55/(SPECIAL + 51))

Scales from 3% at base to ~27% at high SPECIAL

bonuses.title: Hootini's Bonus
bonuses.description: Hootini deals 25-81%+ extra damage to marked enemies. This is a personal multiplier that only applies to Hootini's attacks, separate from the shared debuff.
bonuses.formula:
Multiplier = 1.25 + (SPECIAL - 4) √ó 0.035

At SPECIAL=4: 1.25√ó (25% bonus)
At SPECIAL=50: 2.86√ó (186% total damage)

content.text: Combined Damage Example
With SPECIAL=50, against a marked enemy:

items: Enemy takes +14% damage from all sources (shared debuff)
Hootini deals +161% personal bonus damage (2.61√ó multiplier)
Combined: Hootini deals 2.61 √ó 1.14 = 2.98√ó total damage (198% increase)

content.text: Important Mechanic: Mark damage is applied LAST after base damage. This means the mark's damage amplification can still deal damage even if the base attack would kill the enemy, ensuring no wasted damage.
Mark Application Formula
To use Runic Mark effectively, understand these activation conditions:

items: Manual Activation Required: Must press the Runic Mark button
Sufficient Stamina: Must have at least 4 stamina available
Companion Awake: Companion must not be sleeping
Not on Cooldown: 40-second cooldown must be complete
Enemy Must Be Hit: Mark only applies on successful hit after activation

content.text: Smart Auto-Behavior
Once activated, Hootini intelligently manages the mark:

items: If enemy is unmarked: Next hit applies the mark (costs 3 stamina)
If enemy is marked: Automatically enables +25-81% damage bonus (no stamina cost)
Won't waste marks on already-marked enemies
Cooldown starts AFTER mark is applied, not when button is pressed

content.text: Pro Tip: The mark lasts 12 seconds but the cooldown is 40 seconds. This means there's a 28-second gap where no marks are active. Plan your mark timing for tough enemies or boss encounters to maximize efficiency.
üó°Ô∏è STR (Strength) ‚Üí Damage

Each STR point increases damage by 0.75%. Hootini has low damage scaling from STR, relying instead on mark multipliers for damage output. The base multiplier is 0.5 (50% of base damage) regardless of special attack status.
‚ö° DEX (Dexterity) ‚Üí Attack Speed & Hit Chance

Each DEX point increases attack speed by 2.0%. Hootini has excellent attack speed scaling, making DEX very effective for maximizing hits during the 12-second mark window. Hit chance increases by 0.625% per DEX point.
üõ°Ô∏è CON (Constitution) ‚Üí Stamina & Regeneration
Each 5 CON points grants +1 max stamina. With base CON=12 and SPECIAL=4, Hootini starts with 6 stamina (3 + 1 + 2), enough for one mark with stamina to spare.
üé≤ LUCK ‚Üí Critical Chance & Critical Damage

content.text: With base LUCK=15, Hootini starts with 8.8% crit chance and 335% crit damage. Each LUCK point adds 0.0875% crit chance and 4% crit damage, making LUCK an excellent secondary stat after SPECIAL.

content.text: SPECIAL is Hootini's most important stat for debuff builds. Every 3.5 SPECIAL grants +1 max stamina. More critically, each SPECIAL point increases the shared debuff asymptotically toward 27% and increases Hootini's personal multiplier by 3.5% (linear scaling).
Mark Timing
Save Runic Mark for:

items: Elite enemies with high HP
Boss encounters where the 12-second window matters most
Situations where the shared debuff helps other companions/player
When you have 4+ stamina available and won't need it soon

content.text: Maximizing Mark Uptime
With a 40-second cooldown and 12-second duration, marks have 30% uptime. Use this window efficiently:

items: Attack as fast as possible during the mark window (DEX helps)
Save high-damage player abilities for marked enemies
Don't waste marks on enemies that will die quickly
Plan mark timing around boss mechanics or damage phases

content.text: Stamina Management

Marking costs 3 stamina. With 6 base stamina, you can mark twice before resting. Higher CON and SPECIAL increase max stamina, allowing more frequent marks. Balance mark usage with companion uptime‚Äîrunning out of stamina means no attacks while sleeping.
Team Synergy
The shared debuff makes Hootini excellent for team-based gameplay. The 3-27% damage amplification applies to all damage sources, including:

items: Your player character's attacks
Other companions' damage
Damage-over-time effects (burns, etc.)
Critical hits and ability damage

content.text: Against Unmarked Enemies

Without marks active, Hootini's high LUCK (15) makes it effective through critical hits. The low damage scaling means you won't deal exceptional damage, but consistent crits keep DPS respectable between mark windows.
